about_the_game:
Katya is a badass fighter. She organizes championships in the darkest places in the world to attract a diverse audience.
Fights always take place between women. however, men can also participate. All fight naked as a protest against the system. She organizes all the fights. They all live their lives intensely. Much of the money raised is used to help prostitutes and other women. The participants have a double life: During the day they are soldiers, mechanics, drivers, businesswomen... At night they strip off all their vanities (and clothes) to fight without hesitation. The game is a clandestine fighting championship. Various combat styles are allowed. It's a matter of priority because everyone is welcome!

The game presents the intimate side of the players. They are nymphomaniacs and fiery. They love to fight and fuck whoever is willing and interested. The battle center is in an industrial park located in a region far from the city. The police keep their distance. It's the condition.
Everyone plays naked, or almost naked. In this first update, we will have two female opponents who will try to defeat Katya.
They do it because they like it!

This game is designed to use the keyboard. (WASD), backspace and arrows. It Will does not work for the controller.
We will soon make it available for Xbox controllers. The player needs to control Katya's opponents. The challenge is to defeat her. The prize will be a good fortune in cash. Katya (who is facing opponents) cannot yet be exchanged for another player.

The team is working on a system that allows interactive sex with the same WASD controls. For now, the sex will be presented as CutScene. Interactive sex will be our holy grail!

content_descriptors.notes:
Characters participate in fights wearing little or no clothing. Nudity at all times. Characters fight naked in most fights. Opponents finish the fight by fucking with great dedication and pleasure. Nudity is constant and sex is explicit.
Every fight cycle ends with consensual sex between opponents.
There is NO sexual assault,
There are NO suicide scenes,
There is NO use of drugs of any kind.

name: Naked Porn Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7, 2.67 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE RTX 2070 or Superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Katya is a badass fighter. She organizes championships in the darkest places in the world to attract a diverse audience. Basically, fights always take place between women. Men don't participate in the fights.
